name: Shooteria v0.1(test)
description:
Description

The goal of the game is to get to the depths of the dungeon and defeat the most dangerous enemies. Collect weapons, pick food for pets and activate them in your inventory to survive as long as possible.

Controls

[L.Shift] - pickup item

[A,D] - moving

[SPACE] - jump/walk up stairs

[E] - open/close inventory

[Mouse] - aiming

[Esc] - back to menu

Developer

Nikita Obmetitsa

I hope there will be more....
